member.summary: Sets the correlation ID for the ambient context.

member.summary: Determines if a log level is enabled for a given category.

member.name: T:JG.Logging.Sinks.RollingInterval
member.summary: Specifies the interval for rolling log files.

member.name: F:JG.Logging.Sinks.RollingInterval.None
member.summary: No rolling (single file).

member.name: F:JG.Logging.Sinks.RollingInterval.Day
member.summary: Roll every day at midnight.

member.name: F:JG.Logging.Sinks.RollingInterval.Hour
member.summary: Roll every hour on the hour.

member.name: F:JG.Logging.Sinks.RollingInterval.Month
member.summary: Roll every month on the first day.

member.name: T:JG.Logging.Sinks.FileSink
member.summary: File sink that writes formatted log entries to rotating log files.

member.name: M:JG.Logging.Sinks.FileSink.#ctor(JG.Logging.Abstractions.ILogFormatter,System.String,System.String,System.Int64,JG.Logging.Sinks.RollingInterval,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the FileSink class.
member.param: The formatter to use for formatting log entries.
The directory to write log files to.
The prefix for log file names.
Maximum size of a single log file in bytes. Default 10MB.
Interval for rolling files. Default is None.
Maximum number of backup files to keep. Default 10.

member.name: M:JG.Logging.Sinks.FileSink.WriteAsync(JG.Logging.Abstractions.LogEntry,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Writes a formatted log entry to the file.

member.name: M:JG.Logging.Sinks.FileSink.DisposeAsync
member.summary: Releases resources associated with this sink.
